info.title: They Do Not Die
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
They Do Not Die is a zombie shooter.

Controls:
Nunchuck analog stick = Move
A button = Run
B button = Shoot

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
thatotherdev.wordpress.com

Surrounded background music by RekcahDam
www.rekcahdam.com
